name: Campervan Illustration Cushion
description:
A perfect retro cushion for your campervan or car, or to take camping!

An original illustration, digitally coloured and printed onto cotton satin fabric.

Now available in red, blue, pink, orange or yellow.

Cushion is 40 x 30cm, made from cotton satin and cotton, and should be hand-washed only. 

The back is made from a coordinating retro style fabric, with zip.

A feather cushion insert is included.

name: Holga Camera Cushion - Pink or Blue Design
description:
Fun new Holga camera design, from an original illustration, a great gift for any camera lover!

This design is digitally printed onto a cotton fabric with a coordinating retro patterned back, and comes in two different colours - bright pink and mustard or turquoise blue and green.

The cushion is approx 40 x 40cm, with a zip close, and fits a 41 x 41cm (16 x 16 inches) cushion insert.

A feather cushion insert can be included.

name: Typewriter Cushion - Blue or Pink Design
description:
New retro typewriter design, from an original illustration, a brightly coloured addition to any home or workspace! This cushion could make a nice gift for someone's studio or office.

This design is digitally printed onto a cotton fabric with a coordinating retro patterned back, and comes in two different colours - blue typewriter on a pink background or pink typewriter on a blue background.

The cushion is approx 40 x 40cm, with a zip close, and fits a 41 x 41cm (16 x 16 inches) cushion insert.

A feather cushion insert can be included.

options.name: blue typewriter on pink - no insert
blue typewriter on pink - feather insert
pink typewriter on blue - no insert
pink typewriter on blue - feather insert

name: Venezia Red Cushion
description:
Design created from an illustration of Basilica di San Marco in Venice. Hand-drawn with bold colours infused from the bright costumes and colours of the Venice carnival.

The Italia collection was inspired by travelling through Italy, and the buildings and architecture of Italian cities.

This design is digitally printed onto cotton satin fabric, with a patterned cotton fabric back, and hand-made.

Cushion size is approx 40 x 40cm, size may vary slightly as this product is handmade, with an envelope style back.

Cushion cover fits a 41 x 41cm (16 x 16 inches) cushion insert, which can be included at an additional cost.

name: Venezia Yellow Cushion
description:
Design created from an illustration of Basilica di San Marco in Venice. 

The Italia collection was inspired by travelling through Italy, and the buildings and architecture of Italian cities.

This design is digitally printed onto cotton satin fabric, with a patterned cotton fabric back, and hand-made.

Cushion size is approx 40 x 30cm, with a zip for cushion insert.

Feather cushion insert included.
